name: FallRisk
title: Fall Risk
description: This value set may undergo changes until the HL7 Multiple Chronic Care FHIR IG is formally published in 2024.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing Fall Risk.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an assessment of the person's fall risk.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes GROUP codes for Fall Risk.),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Fall Risk.)

contains.display: Fallen in last 6 months
At increased risk for falls (finding)
At moderate risk for fall (finding)
Event description fall MERSTH
At low risk for fall (finding)

At high risk for fall (finding)
Falls trigger [Minimum Data Set]
Resident assessment protocol 11--Falls - triggered [Minimum Data Set]
Resident assessment protocol 11--Falls - proceed with care [Minimum Data Set]
Falls in the past year

Fall one or more times in the last 2 to 6 months prior to admission [CMS Assessment]
Any fracture related to a fall in the 6 months prior to admission [CMS Assessment]
Has the patient had any falls since admission or prior assessment [CMS Assessment]
Standardized fall risk assessment was conducted [CMS Assessment]
Plan of care includes fall prevention interventions [CMS Assessment]

Falls - addressed in care plan [MDSv3]
I fall down easily in the past 7 days [NeuroQol.Peds]
Fall scale [UPDRS]

Number of falls in the past 3 months - Reported
